What's this about?

A one person effort to develop a PC game. One that wouldn't be made by any big company today. I value simple mechanics, pleasing aestethics and fun while playing. The game will be done when it's done. In the meantime I would value your feedback.

  • Amazing Art
  • Angry AI
  • Tense, Tetrislike Timepreassure
  • Strategic Strategizing
  • Annoying Alliterations
  • Terrific Title

Features in the works!
